item.title: How to Remove Old Kernels in Ubuntu
item.description:
sudo apt install byobu
sudo purge-old-kernels

Reference:

  • Remove Old Kernels (https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Lubuntu/Documentation/RemoveOldKernels)
